name: BankTracking Dev
postCreateCommand: curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash && export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun" && export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && dotnet nuget locals all --clear || true && (dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef --version 10.* --disable-parallel || dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef --version 8.* --disable-parallel || echo 'dotnet-ef install failed, continuing') && dotnet restore && cd frontend && bun install
postStartCommand: docker compose up database -d && echo 'Devcontainer ready. You can run: dotnet run --project PhantomDave.BankTracking.Api & and bun run start --prefix frontend'
